18050.desc: Increases this ship's Torpedo Crit Rate by $1 and Torpedo Crit DMG by 65.0%. Additionally, when this ship fires its Torpedoes: increases this ship's EVA by $2 for 6s.
18050.name: Body and Soul+

18070.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: $1 chance to fire an improved special barrage. Barrage damage is based on the skill's level.
18070.name: A Legend's Inheritance+

18100.desc: After the battle begins and every 30s after that: deploys 4 rotating shields that can each block up to 8 hits. Shields last for $1s.
18100.desc_get: After the battle begins and every 30s after that: deploys 4 rotating shields that can each block up to 8 hits. Shields last for <color=#92fc63FF>5</color>s (<color=#92fc63FF>15</color>s when fully upgraded.)
18100.name: Well-Rounded Armor+

18120.desc: Increases this ship's Speed by $1. At the start of the battle: increases this ship's EVA by $2 for 50s.
18120.desc_get: Increases this ship's Speed by <color=#92fc63FF>3</color> (<color=#92fc63FF>8</color> when fully upgraded.) At the start of the battle: increases this ship's EVA by <color=#92fc63FF>15.0%</color> (<color=#92fc63FF>35.0%</color> when fully upgraded) for 50s.
18120.name: Engine Boost+

18130.desc: When an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: increases this ship's FP and AA by $1 for 8s; if your Airspace Control of the map is at Parity or higher: this buff's duration extends until the end of the battle, but does not stack. Additionally, when your fleet has shot down 15 or more aircraft in one battle: increases this ship's FP and RLD by $2 until the end of the battle.
18130.name: No-Fly Zone!+

18150.desc: Decreases this ship's Main Gun Spread Range by 3 and increases its DMG dealt to CAs, CBs, BCs, BBs, and BBVs by $1, and also increases its DMG dealt to CVs and CVLs by $2.
18150.name: Iron Sight Caliber+

18180.desc: 10s after the start of the battle: fires a special torpedo barrage ($1) and decreases this ship's DMG taken by $2 for 50s. After every 8 hits with this ship's Torpedoes (barrage torpedoes do not count): fires this same barrage.
18180.name: Kitakaze Style - Lotus Torpedoes+

18200.desc: Every 20s: $1 chance to increase this ship's EVA by $2, Accuracy by $3, and decrease this ship's torpedo DMG taken by $4 for 12s.
18200.name: Mizuho's Intuition+

18210.desc: Fires a special barrage that Burns enemies once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns. While equipping a Large-Caliber Main Gun: increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by $1, lowers the number of shots needed to fire the barrage to 4, and improves the barrage.
18210.name: Special Gunnery Training+

18250.desc: At the start of battle, if this ship's HP is greater than 50.0%: increases this ship's AA by $2 and improves this ship's Precision Salvo Protocol barrage. Additionally, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0%: for 8s, increases this ship's EVA by $1 and restores a total of 8.0% of its max HP (this effect can only be triggered twice per battle).
18250.name: Emotion Inhibition Module+

18270.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first 2 waves of torpedoes by $1. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance to increase this ship's FP, EVA, and AA by $2 until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 3 times. While this ship's HP is at 80.0% or higher: increases this ship's DMG dealt with torpedoes by $3.
18270.name: Bounce Right Back+

18290.desc: Increases this ship's built-in Secondary Gun's Crit Rate by $2 and improves its ammo type. When this ship uses a Main Gun that fires Normal or HE ammo: this ship's Main Gun ammo type changes to $1 special HE+ that has a chance to inflict a special Burn to enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level). Decreases the shot requirement of this ship's All Out Assault skill to 6.
18290.name: The Fearless Privateer+

18300.desc: Every $1s: fires a special barrage that penetrates enemy shields and heals this ship for 20.0% of the DMG dealt (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.) Increases this ship's FP and EVA by $2 and RLD by $3.
18300.name: Flintlock Burst+

18320.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's Speed by 5 and EVA by $1 and decreases her DMG taken by $2 for 60s; increases this ship's Crit DMG by $3 and, every 15s: $4 chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
18320.name: Ausgewogen+

18340.desc: Every 18s: $1 chance to fire a special barrage that ignores enemy shields (improved pattern; DMG is based on the skill's level.) Changes the Spread Angle of this ship's torpedoes.
18340.name: Herteitr's Rolling Thunder+

18350.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's Main Guns by $1 and fires an additional $2 barrage along with this ship's primary Salvoes (improved pattern; barrage is unaffected by this ship's position). Every 20s: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
18350.name: Augmenting Mechanism: Setzer Principle+

19000.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to Sirens by 5.0%.
19000.name: Siren Killer Ⅰ

19001.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to Sirens by 10.0%.
19001.name: Siren Killer Ⅱ

19002.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to Sirens by 15.0%.
19002.name: Siren Killer Ⅲ

19010.desc: Increases this ship's DMG with AP by $1.
19010.name: MKV-Class AP Shells

19020.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0%: restores $1 of its max HP and increases this ship's RLD by 30.0% for the rest of the battle.
19020.name: Goddess of the Sea

19030.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: $1 chance to fire a special barrage. Decreases the Speed of enemies hit by the barrage by $2 for 6s. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.
19030.name: Monarch's Coercion

19040.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0%: restores 12.0% of its max HP over 8s. Additionally, for every 1.0% of max HP lost since the start of the battle: increases this ship's RLD by $1.
19040.name: Against the Current

19050.desc: Increases this ship's Torpedo Crit Rate by $1 and Torpedo Crit DMG by 65.0%.
19050.name: Body and Soul

19060.desc: When this ship fires its Torpedoes: $1 chance to launch a special torpedo barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.
19060.name: Flash of Lightning

19070.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: $1 chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.
19070.name: A Legend's Inheritance

19080.desc: Decreases the AP DMG this ship takes by $1 but slightly increases this ship's chance of catching fire (depends on the enemy's weapon caliber; maximum of 6.0%) and increases its Burn Duration by 3s.
19080.name: Specialized Armor

19090.desc: Changes the ammo type of this ship's Main Guns to HE. Every time this ship fires its Main Guns: increases this ship's RLD by $1 (can be stacked up to 12 times.) The ammo type of this ship's Main Guns will alternate between HE and AP every 2 shots.
19090.name: Expert Loader

19100.desc: Every 30s: deploys 4 rotating shields that can each block up to 8 hits. Shields last for $1s.
19100.desc_get: Every 30s: deploys 4 rotating shields that can each block up to 8 hits. Shields last for 5s (15s when fully upgraded.)
19100.name: Well-Rounded Armor

19110.desc: Increases this ship's DMG with HE by $1 but decreases its chance to ignite enemies by 3.0%.
19110.name: Augmented HE Ammo

19120.desc: Increases this ship's Speed by $1. At the start of the battle: increases this ship's EVA by $2 for 40s.
19120.desc_get: Increases this ship's Speed by 3 (8 when fully upgraded.) At the start of the battle: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% (35.0% when fully upgraded) for 40s.
19120.name: Engine Boost

19130.desc: When an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: increases this ship's FP and AA by $1 for 8s. When your fleet has shot down 15 or more aircraft in one battle: increases this ship's FP by $1 and RLD by $2 until the end of the battle.
19130.name: No-Fly Zone!

19140.desc: While equipping a Main Gun in this ship's Secondary Weapon slot: increases this ship's Anti-Air Gun efficiency by $1. If instead equipping an Anti-Air Gun in this slot: increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by $2. While placed in the rearmost position of your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $3.
19140.name: Dual Nock

19150.desc: Decreases this ship's Main Gun Spread Range by 3 and increases its DMG dealt to CAs, CBs, BCs, BBs, and BBVs by $1.
19150.name: Iron Sight Caliber

19160.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: $1 chance to fire a special barrage.
19160.name: Heavy Barrel Blaster

19170.desc: This ship's Main Guns ignore the enemy's Armor Type and its Main Gun DMG increases based on the skill's level ($1.) While equipping a Sakura Empire Main Gun: increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by $2.
19170.name: Kitakaze Style - Horizon Splitter

19180.desc: 10s after the start of battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: fires a special torpedo barrage ($1.) After every 10 hits with this ship's Torpedoes (barrage torpedoes do not count): fires this same barrage.
19180.name: Kitakaze Style - Lotus Torpedoes

19190.desc: When this ship equips a Main Gun with a caliber of 280mm or higher: increases its Main Gun DMG based on the distance its shells travel to reach the enemy, up to a maximum of $1. Increases this ship's Burn DMG dealt by $2.
19190.name: Blazing Peaks

19200.desc: Every 20s: $1 chance to increase this ship's EVA by $2 and Accuracy by $3 for 12s.
19200.name: Mizuho's Intuition

19210.desc: Fires a special barrage once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns. While equipping the Prototype Triple 310mm Main Gun (Type 0): increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by $1, lowers the number of shots needed to fire the barrage to 4, and improves the barrage.
19210.name: Special Gunnery Training

19220.desc: When this ship takes DMG or when an enemy comes within close range of this ship: fires a $1 special barrage that ignores the enemy's Armor Type (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.) Has a 15s cooldown between activations.
19220.name: Symphony of Destruction

19230.desc: When this ship fires an odd-numbered Salvo: increases its RLD by $1 and DMG dealt by $2 until its next reloaded Salvo. When this ship fires an even-numbered Salvo: increases its Crit Rate by $2 and Crit DMG by $1 until its next reloaded Salvo.
19230.name: Sonata of Chaos

19240.desc: Applies a buff to this ship based on its HP remaining. When between 100% and 70%: increases FP by $1; when between 70% and 30%: increases FP by $2 and decreases DMG taken by $2; when less than 30%: decreases DMG taken by $3.
19240.name: Rhapsody of Darkness

19250.desc: Up to twice per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0%: for 8s, increases this ship's EVA by $1 and restores a total of 8.0% of its max HP.
19250.name: Emotion Inhibition Module

19260.desc: Each Main Gun reload gives this ship 2 Salvoes that can be fired independently. This ship's DMG bonus with manually aimed Salvoes becomes $2. Every 20s: $1 chance to fire a special barrage (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.)
19260.name: Precision Salvo Protocol

19270.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first wave of torpedoes by $1. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance to increase this ship's FP, EVA, and AA by $2 until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 3 times.
19270.name: Bounce Right Back

19280.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1. Every 12s after the start of the battle: $2 chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
19280.name: Grin and Fire!

19290.desc: Increases this ship's built-in Secondary Gun Crit Rate by $2 and improves its ammo. When this ship uses a Main Gun that fires Normal or HE ammo: this ship's Main Gun ammo type changes to $1 special HE with a chance to cause a special Burn to enemies (special HE DMG increase is based on the skill's level.)
19290.name: The Fearless Privateer

19300.desc: Every $1s: fires a special barrage that ignores enemy shields and heals this ship for 15.0% of the DMG dealt (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.) When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and EVA by $2 and RLD by $3 until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 3 times; if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard at the start of the battle: immediately gives all 3 stacks of this buff.
19300.name: Flintlock Burst

19310.desc: Every 15s: deploys a shield in front of this ship that lasts 8s and can block up to 6 enemy shells; if this shield is destroyed within the allotted time: fires a barrage and increases this ship's FP and Accuracy by $1 until the end of the battle. This buff can be stacked twice.
19310.name: Retaliatory Shield

19320.desc: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: increases this ship's Speed by 5 and EVA by $1 until the end of the battle, and decreases its DMG taken by $2 for 30s; if NOT in the frontmost position: increases this ship's Crit DMG by $3 and, every 15s: has a $4 chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
19320.name: Ausgewogen

19330.desc: Changes this ship's position and decreases its DMG taken by $1. Every 15s: commences a sonar scan, revealing the location of all enemy SSs for $2s, reducing their accuracy by $4, and decreasing your Vanguard's DMG taken from torpedoes by $3 for $2s.
19330.name: Mímir's Keen Eyes

19340.desc: Every 18s: $1 chance to fire a special barrage with thunderbolts that ignore enemy shields (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Changes the Spread Angle of this ship's torpedoes.
19340.name: Herteitr's Rolling Thunder

19350.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's Main Guns by $1 and fires an additional $2 barrage along with its primary Salvoes. Every 20s: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
19350.name: Augmenting Mechanism: Setzer Principle

19360.desc: When this ship uses a Main Gun that fires HE ammo: increases its FP by $4, AA by $1, and increases its HE DMG modifier against enemies with Heavy armor by $1; when using one that fires AP: increases this ship's FP by $4, RLD by $1, and increases its Crit Rate by $2. While this ship is above 75.0% HP: absorbs 50.0% of the DMG your Flagship takes (does nothing if this ship is the Flagship); when this ship's HP falls below 75.0%: increases this ship's EVA and Accuracy by $3.
19360.name: Substitute Mechanism: Holy Thurible

19380.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to launch an additional special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).
19380.name: Sky-Rending Retribution

19390.desc: When this ship is equipped with a Fighter: fires a $1 special barrage every 12s; when this ship has no Fighters equipped: instead follows up her every Airstrike with a $2 slashing attack (barrage and slash attack DMG are based on the skill's level).
19390.name: Flame-Anointed Conquest

19400.desc: When this ship is equipped with Sakura Empire aircraft: increases this ship's AVI and Accuracy by $1; when none are equipped: instead increases this ship's AA and Accuracy by $1.
19400.name: The Great One's Shadow

19410.desc: When this ship's Torpedoes hit an enemy: decreases the target's Speed by $1 for 5s. As long as this ship is not Out of Ammo, increases this ship's EVA by $2.

19420.desc: When this ship is equipped with a Main Gun that fires Normal or AP ammo: decreases this ship's DMG taken by $1 and increases Crit Rate by $2; when equipping one that fires HE ammo: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $3, but makes her unable to Burn enemies. If the equipped Main Gun is high-caliber: also increases this ship's Main Gun Efficiency by $4.

19430.desc: If there are no enemies near this ship when she fires her Main Guns: inflicts Armor Break to all enemies hit; once every 8 times her Main Guns are fired: fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship's Main Gun is high-caliber: decreases the number of shots required to 4.
19430.name: Jöttun's Jaws

19440.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by $1; when this ship fires her Torpedoes: $2 chance to fire a special barrage $3 (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: instead decreases the loading time of this ship's next wave of Torpedoes by 3s.

19450.desc: When this ship fires her Torpedoes: deploys a smokescreen and a barrier. Smokescreen lasts 5s and increases Evasion Rate by $1 for all your ships in it (does not stack with other smokescreen skills). The barrier lasts 5s and can absorb DMG up to $2 of this ship's max HP. If this barrier is destroyed before it expires: this ship gains 100% Evasion Rate for 2s.

19460.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to inflict 234 DMG to all enemies and reduce their Speed to 0 for 2.5s, restored to normal over 1s.

19470.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional $1 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). Inflicts Armor Break to all Light and Medium armor enemies hit by this airstrike.

19480.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to CLs and CAs by $1. When this ship is equipped with Iron Blood aircraft: increases this ship's AVI and RLD by $2 and Fighter efficiency by $3.

19490.desc: When this ship has the Out of Ammo debuff: decreases the DMG penalty's effect by $1. When this ship fires her Main Guns: $2 chance to fire a frontal barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: heals this ship for 5.0% of her max HP.
19490.name: Legendary Voyage

101010.desc: If deployed with any other Neptunia ship, increases own damage by $1 and decreases own damage taken by 6.0%. For every other Neptunia ship deployed, further increases own damage by $2,and decreases own damage taken by 1.0%
101010.name: Protagonist Aura

101020.desc: Upon taking damage, $1 chance to increase own damage dealt by $2 for 8 seconds.
101020.name: Medistation S

101030.desc: If in the same fleet as Vert or Green Heart, increases own damage dealt by $1 and damage taken by $2. Otherwise, decreases own damage taken by $3 and damage dealt by $4.
101030.name: Power Break

101040.desc: For each Destroyer in the fleet, increases own reload by $2 and reduces damage taken from shelling by $1.
101040.name: Assam Link

101050.desc: Every $1 times the main gun is fired, the next main gun salvo will critically strike.
101050.name: Cross Combination

101060.desc: After 115 seconds in combat, unleashes a devastating barrage ($1). Can only activate once per combat.
101060.desc_get: Unleash an extremely powerful barrage 115 seconds after the start of battle. Power based on skill level. May only use once per battle.
101060.name: Victory Slash

101070.desc: $1 chance to activate every 20 seconds, fires a strong barrage ($2) that has a chance to set enemies on fire for 12 seconds.
101070.desc_get: Every 20 seconds, 20.0% chance (40.0% when fully upgraded) to launch a powerful barrage which may ignite hit enemy ships for 12 seconds. Power based on skill level.
101070.name: Blaze Break

101080.desc: Main gun shots will ignore enemies' armor type. Further increases main gun damage based upon skill level.
101080.name: Tricolor Order

101090.desc: $1 chance to activate every 20 seconds, fires a strong barrage ($2).
101090.desc_get: Every 20 seconds, 20.0% chance (40.0% when fully upgraded) to launch a powerful barrage. Power based on skill level.
101090.name: Lacy Dance

101100.desc: Each main gun hit increases own torpedo critical chance by $1, stacking up to 20 times. All stacks are consumed after firing torpedoes.
101100.name: Tänzerin Trombe

101110.desc: $1 chance to activate every 20 seconds, fires a strong barrage ($2) that has a chance to slow enemies for 8 seconds.
101110.desc_get: Every 20 seconds, 20.0% chance (40.0% when fully upgraded) to launch a powerful barrage. Reduce Speed of each enemy hit for 8 seconds.
101110.name: Getter Ravine

101120.desc: Every 15 seconds, switches between the following effects: 1) Reduces damage taken by $1, 2) Increases damage dealt by $2, 3) Restores $3 HP every 3 seconds.
101120.name: Darjeeling Rotation

101130.desc: $1 chance to activate every 20 seconds, launch a special airstrike ($2).
101130.desc_get: Every 20 seconds, 20.0% chance (40.0% when fully upgraded) to unleash an airstrike with special aviation. Power based on level.
101130.name: Rainy Ratnapura

104010.desc: Every 20s: this ship performs super A.I. hacking to decrease the FP, TRP, and AVI of all enemies by a large amount (up to $1) for 8s... Also has a small chance to accidentally increase the stats of all enemies instead.
104010.name: Kizuna Beam

104020.desc: When this ship takes DMG: $1 chance to fire a special torpedo barrage and avoid all enemy attacks for 3s. Once the effect ends: increases this ship's EVA by $2 for 3s.
104020.name: Crisis Prevention!

104030.desc: For each Kizuna AI in your fleet (excluding this ship) at the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP by $1 (can be stacked up to 4 times.) If there are no other Kizuna AIs in your fleet: decreases the DMG this ship takes by $2 for 30s after the battle starts.
104030.name: Connected

104040.desc: Decreases the duration this ship Burns by 3s and decreases the HE DMG it takes by $1.
104040.name: Everything Is In Order

104050.desc: 30s, 45s, and 60s after the start of the battle: launches a $1 special airstrike. Airstrike damage is based on the skill's level.
104050.name: Future Base

104060.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike while sortied with Kizuna AI: $1 chance for the Airstrike to deal double DMG.
104060.name: Melty World

104070.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by $1 but increases its Spread Range by 1. Every 16s after the start of the battle: $2 chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage damage is based on the skill's level.
104070.name: Super AIming Adjustments

104080.desc: Increases this ship's Accuracy and EVA by $1 through the use of advanced super A.I. tracking.
104080.name: Coercion Assistance Mode

105010.desc: Dive Bombers can be equipped in this ship's third gear slot, and will use the "Mach 2.42 Bermbew Sprawt" gear skin, but Airstrike load time increases by 100.0%. Every 20s: launches a $1 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's TRP stat.)
105010.name: Mach 2.42 Blossom

105020.desc: Increases this ship's FP by $1 at the start of the battle. If the fleet this ship is in has sunk 3 enemy fleets on the map: also increases this ship's TRP by $2.
105020.name: Two-Faced Fox

105030.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage that Burns enemies. DMG is based on the skill's level.
105030.name: Dream☆Story

105040.desc: Decreases DMG taken by Hololive ships by $2. Every 20s: for 8s, decreases the Speed of all onscreen enemies by $1, increases the Accuracy of all your ships by $1, and increases the Speed of all your Hololive ships by $1.
105040.name: Beneath the Deep Blue Sky

105050.desc: Decreases this boat's OXY by $1. For 20s after entering battle: increases this boat's DMG by $2. When this boat retreats from battle: increases its Speed by 100.0%.
105050.name: Shut-in Maid

105060.desc: When entering battle: applies 1 randomly chosen buff to your fleet. The buff's effect is increased to 150% for Hololive ships.
105060.name: Failen Angel

105070.desc: When entering battle: fires a special guaranteed $1 Critical Hit barrage. When there are 3 or more Hololive ships in the same fleet: improves the barrage.
105070.name: Promise to the Sunflower

105080.desc: Every 25s: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage.
105080.name: The Summer Flower We Watch

105090.desc: At the start of the battle: if there are an odd number of Hololive ships in your fleet: increases this ship's Main Gun DMG by $1. If their number is even: decreases the Main Gun DMG this ship takes by $2. 20s after the start of the battle: randomly chooses 1 of your ships and decreases the DMG they take by $2 for 10s.
105090.name: The Third Day of Flirting

105100.desc: Every 20s: $2 chance for this ship to buff itself using its spirits. When successfully procced: increases this ship's DMG dealt by $1. Can be stacked up to 3 times.
105100.name: Oni Goddess☆Nakiri

105110.desc: Every $1s: activates Demon Cutter Asura-Rakshasa $2 and gives this ship an 50.0% chance to inflict Armor Break (affected targets take more Main Gun DMG) to hit enemies for 6s. Slash DMG is based on the skill's level.
105110.name: Demon Cutter Asura-Rakshasa

105120.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: $1 chance to create a wave of light for 8s which decreases the DMG enemies deal by $2.
105120.name: The Wave of a Pleasant Dream

105130.desc: Every 8s: gain 1 MP. When this ship has accumulated 3 MP: fires a $1 special barrage, and resets MP to 0.
105130.name: MP Burst - Explosion

105140.desc: When this ship launches an odd-numbered Airstrike: launches an additional Torpedo Bomber airstrike $1. When launching an even-numbered Airstrike: launches an additional Dive Bomber airstrike $1. Airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.
105140.name: Wild Dualism

105150.desc: At the start of the battle: makes a divination that applies a randomly chosen $1 buff to this ship.
105150.name: Tarot Card Divination

106010.desc: After the battle starts: for 60s, increases this ship's FP and TRP by $3. When this ship takes DMG: $1 chance to fire a $2 special barrage that always crits (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between activations.)
106010.name: Rose's Thorns

106020.desc: Increases the DMG of this ship's first 3 torpedo launches of each battle by $1. When this ship fires its Torpedoes: for 8s, increases your Vanguard's Speed by 3 and EVA by $2 for the ship in the frontmost position of your Vanguard.
106020.name: Vibrant Minuet

106030.desc: Increases this ship's FP by $1 and damage against Light Armor enemies by $3. 5s after this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a randomly chosen $2 barrage using special ammo.
106030.name: Rock-Paper-Cannon Salvo

106040.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: heals 2 random ships in your fleet for 5.0% of their max HP and, with a $1 chance, fires a $2 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
106040.name: Super Mega Explosion

106050.desc: Every 15s after the start of the battle, and every time this ship lands 6 hits with its Torpedoes: fires a $1 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)
106050.name: Sakura Petal Dance
